website_summaries.verdict: Uses mostly natural ingredients to provide lean protein that helps with dieting.
pros: Has 25 grams of protein per serving, which should help satisfy your hunger
Price per ounce is about average
Works equally well as a meal replacement or post-workout shake
Only 160 calories per serving, which is great for dieters
cons: Doesn't always mix fully, leaving a gritty texture
May be too sweet for some

customer_reviews.title: New version "grass-fed" has removed most vitamins and minerals
customer_reviews.text: So they have discontinued the original version, which was the best overall meal replacement shake I could find. The new grass fed contains way less vitamins, minerals, etc. and is no longer up to the standard of a true, balanced meal replacement. Why??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cinammon Churro Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I had seen the RSP emails about their launch of the Cinammon Churro flavor for TrueFit. I was already a huge fan of the Chocolate one, and this just kick up a notch or two! It mixes super easy with water, and it makes for a super yummy treat if mixed with Almond Milk (unsweetened) and a tbs of almond butter. That’s dessert right there! I love it in my oatmeal in the mornings too! The thing is, it can be used as a full in meal replacement. It keeps your body going through the toughest workouts and there are absolutely NO bloating or digestive side effects. I am in love!
customer_reviews.author: Thereza Nicolini

customer_reviews.title: GRAINY & GROSS!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s disgusting! Super grainy and doesn’t mix well at all. You can’t even add it to milk. Literally feels and tasted like sand on your glass. I stirred this grainy mess for 10 minutes and could never get it to mix.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Sickeningly sweet
customer_reviews.text: This product was absolutely awful because it is sickeningly sweet. Although it was prime, you will be charged a hefty fee in postage to return it and will be stuck with the HUGE jar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The taste is pretty good with Almond Milk and it kills the hunger ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do the job. The taste is pretty good with Almond Milk and it kills the hunger for a few hours. I liked the Garden of Life meal replacement drinks better but they're also a lot more expensive. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: max_smart

customer_reviews.title: Serving size was inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan . Always went with the lean1 fat burning meal replacement 5lb bag price jumped up and this was on prime day seemed like a good deal. I buy based off reviews , and price per serving and how many servings. I'm aware that powder can compress and maybe you don't get that last serving but I unfortunately only got 11 out of the 20 . Taste is good but it gets super thin with any amount of liquid .
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Upset my stomach ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like it but it upsets my stomach. Taste is okay though. Optimum Nutrition is my go to and it doesn’t upset my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I love this protein powder - I have tried many different ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder - I have tried many different kinds - For someone trying to lose weight you need a combination of Low carbs, low cal, high protein, and great taste, and this is the best combo. This tastes great with soy milk, almond milk or water. I use this as a meal replacement only for breakfast and do meals for the rest of the day, but I have lost 12 lbs in 2 weeks so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Faydra Chism

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan but
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. Seems to give me what I need. What I don't like however is that you get this huge container and you think your getting a good amount for your money but when you open it only half full so that's a letdown
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the vanilla powder and recently purchased the chocolate to mix things up. This product has been instrumental in my weight loss efforts. I use it once, sometimes twice per day depending on my schedule. Great list of ingredients. It blends well with or without a blender, tastes great and no aftertaste. My morning shake consists of this powder, unsweetened almond milk and six ounce of home brewed black coffee. Evening shake is the same minus the black coffee. I add frozen fruit to it to thicken it up . Very pleased with the product and the progress it had helped me achieve. The price is right and the customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.A.

customer_reviews.title: and this one blends and tastes much better! A little ice
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for first time tonight, I have also tried the Vega One supplement, and this one blends and tastes much better! A little ice, water , and almond milk with half a banana perfect! I am hoping to use this help me lose about 25 lbs and it does fill you up. AS others have stated, it tastes great and is like drinking a chocolate malt. I am interested to see if it keeps me full for two hours. So far, I like the product!
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, taste good, mixes well, and it will hold me over for a few hours if I'm hungry! I've had the chocolate flavor and vanilla, both are good but I like the vanilla better. I used this for a meal replacement after I had my son, I would only use it once a day, it did help me lose a TON of weight after the baby. I do eat pretty healthy but I definitely recommend it for a replacement, my son is two now and I started using this again to lose the last ten pounds that wouldn't budge, no matter what I did, I've lost five of it in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: I did love the taste of this stuff...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I ordered the chocolate grass-fed version I absolutely hate the different taste! I tried to order the regular version and I don’t know if they’ve run out or they are getting rid of it. Grrrr... Btw, the churro flavor isn’t that great, again it’s a grass fed version. *So this is the 3rd time I’m ordering and RSP has to be the best tasting shakes. Not thick, gritty, no after taste and or weird smell! I absolutely use to detest taking any protein drinks because of those issues. I’m happy to finally have something I could finally drink w/ a decent amount of protein! Hope you enjoy too. *original review with 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Emmie

customer_reviews.title: Natural ingredients,  high protein, no nuts
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, I keep a small ziplock of this in my briefcase to pour into a bottle of water whenever I am between meetings and need a healthy snack. Simple, organic, natural ingredients with low calories and high protein. Even better with milk, a banana, and ice in a blender! My daughter thinks it's ice cream, and it doesn't have any nuts so she can eat it whenever daddy has one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: After surgery, my weight was going up due to medication, my hair was falling (alarming rate) and my nails were splitting. I read that protein would help and purchases this product. After my first reorder I noticed my nails got stronger, my hair stop falling and my weight was stabilizing. I finished the 2nd jar and wonder if it was the product or my body getting back to normal so I did not reorder to found out that my weight was going up and my beautiful nails split and was dull and soft again.. I reorder and I’m back on track again. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: Due to various health issues, I've used meal replacements for many years. RSP TrueFit has risen to the top of my preferred list. I mix it with Almond or Cashew Milk and it tastes great. If I mix a drink up at 8:00 am I don't start getting that empty hole feeling in my stomach until around 2:00 pm. Thus, I have reduced my daily calorie intake and with my limited daily exercise routine I've already lost 15 pounds over the past 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: William Miller

customer_reviews.title: Filling and great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping around and trying different protein shakes. I found this one and saw that it had the probiotics and protbiotics and very little carbs and sugar so decided to order. The shakes taste amazing! They are creamy and filling! I mix mine with water, ice, and one scoop and it lasts me all day till dinner. Can’t beat it especially for price. Comparable to shakeology but a quarter of the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D Booth

customer_reviews.title: Thick, smooth and delicious when added to my raw greens and protein
customer_reviews.text: This product makes any shake taste better and adds a thicker smoother consistency. I also add my raw greens and protein very healthy but not the best taste. I also add peanut butter powder 85% fat and guilt free. I cant wait for my morning shake its delicious and healthy. If I miss a meal I replace it with a shake. Who eats right these days. At least now I make the effort and enjoy it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: JD Paulus

customer_reviews.title: Very good meal replacement protein!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a protein shake that I could also use as a meal replacement. I previously tried different rsp products and I was like why not. They aren't offering many flavors which tells me they are more into quality. And I was right! I mainly used this as a meal replacement. It blends well! Sometimes I mixed with milk to get an even fuller meal. And it did hold me over very good! As for the new packaging! I love it! It's very clean and informative, no need for fancy colors and shapes and fonts, when you know you're getting the quality inside the jar!
customer_reviews.author: Kinga Ravasz

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the best nutrition drink around. My life sucks when I run out and am waiting for more to come. MY only grip is the packaging. I wish they would get rid of this giant tub and use a much more efficient pouch. This takes a ton of space in my cabinet,. and it is less than half full with powder. Other than that, this can't be beat. Beats the pants off of soylent on flavor and price. I've tried others and they suck in comparison. My favorite is chocolate mixed with unsweetened vanilla almond milk. Have it every morning, sometimes for lunch too. Sometimes with quick cook steel cut oats mixed in for some home made overnight oats.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great and Keeps Me Full
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a meal replacement once a day (usually lunch or dinner). Now to be honest I don't have anything to compare this to other than protein powder and the taste is just as good or better minus the calories. I am a big fella and this keeps me full until my next time to eat. The price is amazing. I have completed my 3rd container so I can definitively say I am hooked. Going for a 4th now.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Damon Woods

customer_reviews.title: Taste is amaze!
customer_reviews.text: I’m starting my review with a 5 star due to taste. I’m using this product to replace meals twice a day. I made my first shake this evening for dinner, and wow. I’m probably one of the most picky people in the world. Hence why I’m trying shakes for diet cause i eat nothing. This honestly tastes like a chocolate caramel milkshake. I’m obsessed. I definitely don’t see myself having any issues drinking this daily!! I will try to update on progress.
customer_reviews.author: B. Forbotnick

customer_reviews.title: This is the best protein/ meal product I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein/ meal product I have ever purchased. It has all of the nutrients, protein and fiber I wanted. I drink this for breakfast and mix it with cashew or almond milk. One of the most important details about this product that people should know is how great it tastes. I’m not kidding here ,the chocolate tastes like a malt to me. It really is good which is hard to say about most meal replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Az Cards fan

customer_reviews.title: Best meal replacement by farrrr
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best tasting meal replacement you will find. I’ve tried a TON
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Get taste, use as meal replacement and recovery drink
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. When I use it for a meal replacement I mix with milk-delish. For an after workout recovery drink, I use water, meh, it’s ok but way better with milk. I’ve been using this along with an exercise program and overall healthy eating. It helps curb my appetite and cravings and gives overall extra energy. Ordered a second tub already and will order in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Maria McGeary

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: 2/4/19 Update: Still loving it My favorite is to add a little peanut butter to it! Original post: Day 2, so far so good. The flavor is good and it dissolves fairly well. It didn't have any odd aftertaste like some shakes. It also didn't make me feel bloated like other shakes have.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: First package arrived damaged. Replacement sent right away. Then the company stops offering the 2lb size and wants to replace it with a 1lb size at a 25% price increase. No way! Product i had an odd texture - almost slightly gelatinous. Taste was good but the texture was off putting for me
customer_reviews.author: Anna C

customer_reviews.title: Great Meal Replacement Shake
customer_reviews.text: I have tried two of the three flavors. I use it as a meal replacement about 5 nights a week. After a month or two, I have lost about 10 pounds. The flavors are decent. I mix water, almond milk, Truefit, and ice cubes together. It is a pretty decent combo. I like that the Truefit has lots of healthy ingredients and keeps me filled. I just purchased my third round, but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: RowRight

customer_reviews.title: Best protein/ meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this protein. I have it for my first meal of the day. I add organic peanut butter, frozen blueberries and water. It taste like peanut butter and jelly. LOL! I have ordered it 4 times already and will continue to. I love that it's not filled with a bunch of garbage. The fact that it has probiotics and fiber is a bonus. This will be my go to protein FOREVER.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved this as a meal replacement shake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just to use as a meal replacement shake and I was very happy with it. It did make my hunger go away without making me feel bloated. I mixed one scoop with water for a meal and half a scoop with water for a snack. Its a lot easier to just take a shake for lunch at work than having to figure out a lunch or buying a lunch. I will be reordering this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Luna

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like chocolate milk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after having a baby because I needed something with extra protein on the go with my new crazy life. I loved the flavor, loved the mix, and it did the trick for my busy days and helped me feel fed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This drink actually tastes great! I’m really picky about the flavors of my meal replacement drinks and I like this one. I’m so happy to find one that I enjoy. I’ve only been drinking it for a week but it helps curb my carb cravings.
customer_reviews.author: LL Ham

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Keeps me full for 4-5 hours, tastes great with no chalky after taste! I love the nutrition packed into these. Probiotics and fiber are a huge plus. I used to buy shakes and they’d sit in my cabinet because the flavor was horrible or itmade me feel bloated and gross. I look forward to drinking these every day!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and filling
customer_reviews.text: Super delicious. Very filling. Doesn't settle so no need to continually shake and risk making messes. I've used true fit for about 4 months and look forward to my daily meal replacement or recovery drink. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I drink this around lunch time or when I ate too much and need to have a meal replacement drink instead. The chocolate has great flavor. I cut it with almond milk for a creamy healthy meal. Perfect with a blender bottle to take on the go when busy.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Mcv.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes soooo good! My husband and I have been mixing the chocolate flavor with almond milk in the mornings. We are already on our second container. The price is also great, good customer service and speedy delivery!
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: great taste
customer_reviews.text: I have had several different types of shakes in the past few years. Most have been horrible- either with a vegetable taste or gritty. RSP Truefit is neither. It is smooth even when mixed in a shaker bottle and tastes amazing. Have had both the chocolate milkshake and the cinnamon churro and my biggest problem is deciding which I like better.
customer_reviews.author: Burfiend family

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: This protien powder is delicious! I really like all the fantastic ingredients. It's a bit pricey, but it has veggies, fruit, fiber, and probiotics. It's been a great addition to my protien powder collection. I definitely want to try vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rader

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff. It makes me feel good when I drink it -- full, satisfied and able to focus on whatever I'm doing. Great meal replacement when you need something easy. I'll be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: RSP, a leader in nutrition!
customer_reviews.text: RSP Truefit has been the best protein product by far that I have used. I have also reccomended it to my dad and a workout friend of mine and they both have very much enjoyed the benefits of its it's super food ingredients. I have ordered all flavors multiple times and I will continue to do so because it's the most all around best protein in flavor, ingredients and grams of protein that I have tried. Thanks RSP!
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works for me. It has a pleasant taste. I add a little Greek yogurt and use unsweetened almond milk. I was juicing and pulverizing a ridiculous amount of produce every day. This is a much cheaper meal replacement. It’s nutritious and tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Knox

customer_reviews.title: No gritty residuals
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a breakfast meal replacer to help with keeping me get a quick filling breakfast during my work week. RSP was recommended on a few websites so I ordered the chocolate and hoped for the best. I’ve been having it for breakfast all this week and I LOVE IT!! The taste is smooth and nice strong chocolate flavor. No gritty residuals and no aftertaste. The best benefit is that I’m full after drinking it and it gets me through to lunch. I’ll definitely be keeping stocked up on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very delicious and the ingredients aren't AS bad as other powders
customer_reviews.text: I am usually an ON Nutrition whey protein guy. I have been looking at alternatives that are less "junky." I tried their natural why and it was awful. I tried other alternative formulas of other brands and still awful. So I gave this one a chance!! It is really yummy and has never clumped. It is a rich, kinda thick chocolate taste. Very delicious and the ingredients aren't AS bad as other powders. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J. Fraska

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a number of meal replacement protein mixes before and this is the best tasting one yet. I use 12 ounces of unsweetened Almond milk to 1 scoop and it tastes great. I tried doing less almond milk but it was just too sweet for me. I do that for breakfast but for lunch I use 10 ounces of water to 1 scoop and that tastes good as well.
customer_reviews.author: jessica castle

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good smoothie/milkshake drink mix
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good smoothie/milkshake drink mix. Mixes up easily just shaking it up in a jar. I used it with water and a bit of coconut water. I never tasted the stevia "aftertaste" . If anything I found this to be a bit on the sweet end but still just fine
customer_reviews.author: J. Kerch

customer_reviews.title: It tastes like mocha iced coffee not chocolate.
customer_reviews.text: The product came chip perfectly does directions were clear. What I did not like about the product it taste like a mocha iced coffee. I despise coffee and I damn sure despise iced coffee.
customer_reviews.author: TONY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I Love this stuff. I was trying the whole slimfast thing until I noticed how much sugar was in their stuff. I decided to search for something else and stumbled upon this. This stuff taste great. I drink two of their shakes a day in place of two meals and so far have lost 8lbs in 1 week. I'm loving it. My only request would be too make some more flavors. Strawberry would be nice. Maybe cookies and cream.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Aikens

customer_reviews.title: No bad aftertaste!
customer_reviews.text: Big container, only half filled😒. Taste great and all but won’t be buying again. Great customer service, offered me a replacement item or refund since I was not satisfied, wasn’t expecting that so I was very pleased. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Banuelos

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and energizing
customer_reviews.text: I've used this to make protein shakes to drink when I need some quick calories and protein. It tastes good and helps me keep going when I need some quick protein.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Good Shake, Maybe Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of this particular shake is great. I tried it with water and it made me nauseous, so I switched to unsweetened almond milk and there's no aftertaste, etc. I noticed after drinking them for a few weeks, I developed lower stomach cramps and pain - just not sure this particular product is for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: It is a little too sweet for me. I usually mix my shakes with unsweetened almond milk. But this one also takes ice and spinach blended to cut the super sweet flavor. But it definitely keeps me full!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Laurila

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Tastes great. Sure I sometimes have problems mixing it completely, but all meal replacement shakes are like that. Tastes great. Fills me up for at least 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: bmarked21

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite protein. I started using it about 4 month ago and I'm very pleased by the results. I surprising recover really fast when using it. I usually have muscle pains the next day after the I workout, but I hardly do now!!
customer_reviews.author: Jkidd

customer_reviews.title: It taste pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Idk if it's helping me or not but it taste pretty good. For the price it's pretty nice and it does reduce my appetite for a good 3 hours until I start feeling hungry.. so I guess it works.. I enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: sieg

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to use as a meal replacement with low sugar, high protein, high fiber, and vitamins. I’ve tried a few other brands, but this BY FAR was the best. I use 1% milk and it’s not too sweet and has a shake-like consistency. Keeps me satisfied for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and tasty
customer_reviews.text: I find it has good taste and mixes well, even with water. I appreciate the added vitamins and minerals. My teenage son even likes the taste. I believe his exact words were, "It actually tastes like chocolate."
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: GREAT protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT protein powder! I workout-weights and cardio, 5 days a week and intermittent fast. After a tough workout and 20+ hours of fasting, this is easy on the stomach and packed with probiotics and fiber, which I always need due to lots of stomach surgeries. Taste it is outstanding and mixes easily. Overall, I would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the price. Also this is the best tasting protein shake I've tried yet. Fills you up. No "blah" after taste like most shakes leave. Will keep ordering!
customer_reviews.author: Dms

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gourmet chocolate milkshake flavor and it is delicious! It mixes super well and is not gritty at all, it tastes amazing with just water but sometimes I’ll mix it with almond or cashew milk. One scoop keeps me full for 2-3 hours, it is very convenient for someone with a busy lifestyle who doesn’t have a lot of time to cook food or doesn’t want to resort to always eating junk. Will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler Novak

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy that I tried this product
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I tried this product. After searching high and low, and trying a dozen different shakes I can state with utter confidence that this is the best thing out there. Mixes easily, tastes great, reasonably priced. What's not to love? I highly reccomend this. I would give it a 10 star rating if it were possible.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Meal shakes that tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a pick me up after a long ride on my mtb. The chocolate flavor is pretty good but i recommend the cinnamon churro, its the best nutrition drink ive ever tasted.
customer_reviews.author: .eagle fire

customer_reviews.title: At first it tasted pretty bad, I mix it with water and not ...
customer_reviews.text: On my second bottle. At first it tasted pretty bad, I mix it with water and not milk, so that's part of why. Then, I got used to it and it started tasting better. Can't say for results, as I've been having trouble sticking to my diet and fitness routine. However, it does help as a meal replacement for 2-3 hours as I work and go to school so I tend to skip meals.
customer_reviews.author: Mog821

customer_reviews.title: I love this shake
customer_reviews.text: I love this shake. It does fill me up for 3 hours. Taste is the smoothest I have ever had in a meal replacement shake. Hopefully I will keep going and it will help me in my weight loss goals.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't like it much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and I as our breakfast replacement. He doesn't like it much, but I do. I enjoy the taste a lot. It is chocolatey, but not overpowering. I love mixing it with iced coffee in the morning and slowly sipping it as I go on my morning prep. It does keep me full long enough until it's lunch time.
customer_reviews.author: Jayzebel Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ingredients and love the taste!!!! It’s hard finding the perfect meal replacement shakes that taste good, curb your appetite and don’t have a bunch of junk in it... this is it! If you’re debating.. just get it... you will be glad you did!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bigbie

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It is great for the morning and keeps me full until lunch Cons: Taste- it could just be the flavor i got (chocolate) Overall, I’d buy it again with a different flavor
customer_reviews.author: Northern Lights 0503

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I just drank my first shake with unsweetened almond milk and I just know I will be buying this product over and over again! So good I got the chocolate flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Meal replacement, with rich taste
customer_reviews.text: This is my third meal replacement product, and I feel is a great value. The ingredients were exactly what I was looking for being natural, and no artificial sugar, with no added sugars. Had first shake this morning ( added a tbsp of peanut butter, which may have not been needed ). I did not even use a full scoop that was provided, the shake was thick, rich, and had a great taste.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the best meal replacement ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, everything is organic, they are very transparent and from the moment you open the bottle and smell the chocolate is amazing. Just the right amount of sweetness and its completely different from the other brands this one tastes amazing!!! I would even drink it as a dessert!!! The most caring and amazing brand! I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great meal replacement or snack. Taste is pretty good add it with coconut and almond milk. It gives me more energy than other stuff I’ve tried and the price isn’t bad. I recommend you try it.
customer_reviews.author: Trout Jester

customer_reviews.title: Real food and veg without fillers
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to shake for my breakfast meal replacement and it keeps me full until lunch . Good quality ingredients and an even better company who takes customer service to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: SVLLC

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Tastes Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after deciding that Shakeology was not for me. I was skeptical b/c the price was so reasonable but it is seriously the highlight of my day! I use it with almond milk and will eventually try adding things like PB2 or sugar free caramel syrup, but it's so good just on it's own. Honestly like a chocolate milkshake. It's worth working out just so I can have a shake.
customer_reviews.author: lolly123

customer_reviews.title: Effective meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: Product tastes great and does exactly what it's supposed to do. Im always driving so to be able to have this for lunch instead of fast food is a much healthier option. Been using for four days and have already dropped pounds. Lasts about 4 hours before I need to eat again.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Try it
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate tastes good even with water. Apparently I am lactose intolerant and the protein they use really affected my digestive system. If not for that I would still use daily. I had to switch to plant based proteins. Is a little gritty if you don't blend it. I used a shaker and had to shake shake shake it forever in water to avoid the grit. Worth a try
customer_reviews.author: kenneth gill

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Tried the chocolate flavor and it’s decent, it was a little sweet for my taste. Other than that it kept me satiated for a couple hours and seems like a pretty solid shake. I did upset my stomach a bit though so I don’t think I’ll be repurchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great Chocolate Taste
customer_reviews.text: The taste is great! I was questionable at first because the price is awesome. But after the first taste, I was ready to add peanut butter! This was a great buy and assistance to the busy morning routine
customer_reviews.author: Jose Barraza

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great tasting!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually searching for a similar product, but found it to be expensive, this has similar ingredients at a fraction of that price. this is a great tasting meal replacement shake, I was surprised how good it taste, I mix mine with almond milk.. I would highly recommend this product for a lean meal replacement..
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute BEST chocolate protein shake in the entire world! Keeps me full. Not too sweet but satisfies sweet cravings. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works and tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate is super yummy. I just got the product and have been using it as meal replacement. So far so good, it keeps me full and the flavor keeps my cravings at bay. Next time I want to try the one that boosts your metabolism. That will be my next order for sure. I have done meal replacement before using Body by Vi but I was looking for something more affordable. So glad I gave this product a chance!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleasantly surprised by the flavor. It has almost a coconutty chocolaty flavor that I like. I will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Llama

customer_reviews.title: love this protein shake !!
customer_reviews.text: I usually have issues digesting protein shakes, but since I purchased RSP true fit I don't have any more issues . chocolate flavor is great and dissolves easily with water or low fat milk. I also have purchased the quadra lean and is helping me to lose weight..
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Taste good but doesnt keep me full
customer_reviews.text: It taste good, but um hungry after an hour. Not good for meal replacement at all. RIP off, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Love this protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: It tastes yummy, blends to a creamy smooth consistency and keeps me feeling full all morning
customer_reviews.author: H. Haffner

customer_reviews.title: It actually tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Wow they managed to make a protein powder that tastes great and isn’t insanely expensive! No chalky texture is a huge plus! Very impressed and will purchase again. Side note: the serving scoop is VERY large. Larger than I’ve ever seen in any protein powder. Basically, it’s a large serving. Not negative but an interesting difference compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Andiez

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this stuff. Drinks a cup every morning ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this stuff. Drinks a cup every morning as his breakfast after his 2 mile run. Says it fills him up til lunch at 1.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good taste. Just don't use normal whole milk go for almond milk it taste better.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is great and there's plenty. I don't even use a full cup. Just half a cup as meal replacement mixed with water and it's yummy. That way, it'll last a lot longer as well. I use an appetite control chew with it and drink lots of water. When I do eat, i eat fruits and veggies and the occasional chicken or fish. I'll update in a month or two with results
customer_reviews.author: Flowers&SeaTides

customer_reviews.title: Lean meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: I'm half way through my 2nd container of true fit lean meal replacement. I use it daily, right after a workout and it keeps my full for a few hours. I will continue to use this products as long as it remains unchanged.
customer_reviews.author: Quickdrawdubois

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and filling
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting meal replacement shake I have ever had. Most of them are not pleasant and are gritty even after blending well. I just used almond milk and ice and it blends nicely and tastes great. It's also very filling. This is my new meal on the go and it's also helped me take off some lbs by replacing it with one meal a day.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Eberly

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein shake I've ever had; by far! The taste is great. I use water and almond milk with the chocolate flavor. I have had protein shakes where I've literally had to hold my nose to drink them, so that I wouldn't fully get the taste. With TrueFit, I'm drinking this shake down like it's chocolate milk as it's so smooth with no lumps after mixing it well. I'm sold and will be purchasing more when I run out of my first supply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The chocolate is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor! Most meal replacement shakes have that chalky taste and bad After taste but not this one!!! I got the chocolate flavor. I don’t mix it with anything but water and it’s still amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittanee Goshen

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste and everything that it says it has in it, even the price is good, only hang up i have is it doesnt stay with you when helping with hunger, your most likely gonna have to make a smoothie and add other things to it.
customer_reviews.author: MAMA4

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate is delicious
customer_reviews.text: It’s really good. The chocolate flavor is better. Makes very creamy smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Genzer

customer_reviews.title: Missing seal
customer_reviews.text: Seal not even present when I recieved this product. Looks as if someone had torn it off prior to shipping, as bits and pieces are still around the rim. Not happy about this inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Chavez

customer_reviews.title: There is better protein powder out there
customer_reviews.text: This is not good. It doesn't mix well using a blender bottle (which I use with every protein powder and never had a problem). The taste is not good, I got the chocolate one and I have to force myself to drink all of it. I mix it with milk and that's better than water but barely. I bought it because it has probiotics in it and the macros are good. Probably wont purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I've tried quite a few protein powders and most of them are gross. I was pleasantly surprised when I tried TrueFit in chocolate. I actually ENJOY drinking this as a meal replacement. Truefit has become my go to protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: kim882

customer_reviews.title: So delicious.....
customer_reviews.text: Taste just like a chocolate shake!!! A big THANK YOU for not having that chalky aftertaste. Keeps me full and energized.
customer_reviews.author: DeVaugan Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very creamy and tasty
customer_reviews.text: This so far has been the best tasting protein shake I’ve purchased .
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: excellent replacement
customer_reviews.text: love this! great meal replacement the taste is really good(no after taste)
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Great meal replacement stuff
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product to save time and still have a nutritious breakfast...Works Great. Keeps me full easily until lunch, has a great ingredient list and best of all......The chocolate taste's amazing... I do it with almond milk. Great stuff... I'm in.
customer_reviews.author: KVT

product_meta.title: RSP TRUEFIT - Protein Powder Meal Replacement Shake, Grass-Fed, Organic Real Food, Probiotics, MCT Oil, Non-GMO, Gluten Free, No Artificial Sweeteners, 2 LB Chocolate
feature_bullets: GRASS FED PROTEIN WITH PROBIOTICS - RSP TrueFit contains 25g of grass-fed whey protein, naturally occurring BCAAs and 1 billion CFU probiotics, making it a complete source for your meal replacement, post-workout, and protein shake needs.

REAL FOOD MEAL REPLACEMENT - TrueFit is a lean meal replacement shake for weight loss with whole food ingredients. The superfood blends contains 12 Non-GMO fruits and vegetables, 8 grams of prebiotic fiber, and probiotics to fulfill your complete nutrition needs.
GRASS FED WHEY FROM PASTURE RAISED COWS - The whey protein in TrueFit is sourced from U.S. farms and is derived from pasture raised cows that are never treated with rBST or rBGH.

PROBIOTICS FR HEALTHY DIGESTION - Our digestion blend is designed to improve gut health. TrueFit contains 8g of fiber from sweet potato powder and VitaFiber along with 2-4g of qualit fats from whey and MCT Oil.

NUTRITION ESSENTIALS WITH NO ARTIFICIAL INGREDIENTS - TrueFit is the ideal balance of natural protein, fruits and vegetables, fiber, and quality fats, in one convenient protein shake. It contains no gluten, no artificial flavors or preservatives.
